ftbquests.chapter.avanced_chim.quests1.d: an iron version of the Chimney, unlike the stone this one can not be painted but will make some blocks small bit faster
ftbquests.chapter.avanced_chim.quests2.d: needed to pull from stone vents
Vent must be on the side of block and chimneys on top
ftbquests.chapter.avanced_chim.quests3.d: For left to right movement of smoke
ftbquests.chapter.avanced_chim.quests4.d: needed to pull from iron vents
Vents need to be on the side of the block and chimneys on tops
ftbquests.chapter.avanced_chim.quests5.d: For left to right movement of smoke
ftbquests.chapter.avanced_chim.quests6.d: A simple chimney that more for the looks then anything. can be painted with block and brush
ftbquests.chapter.avanced_chim.quests8.d: There are no uses for these other then for looks meaning you do not have to put then around your base if you hate there look.

ftbquests.chapter.everbright_or_everdark: There will be no quest for these dimasions
do to fact that you will need to find a portal to one of them then get into the other by going though that one its to random to know what portal you will get.
along that line most if the progress you will make its vanilla but changed to look diffrent.
A freindly tip i can give you is this when you enter do not try to use your existing tools as they will not work and alway keep it mind its as if your restarting.
Warning: once you enter all tools/ armor you have will be not be effective anymore this is do to the dim
Warning: Once you enter all tool/ armor you have will not be effective anymore this is to the dim

ftbquests.chapter.nature_magic.title: Nature Magic
ftbquests.chapter.nature_magic.quests2.d: to use fill with water and throw or click the right item in the pool then throw or click seeds or the catylist item in once the recipe is set
ftbquests.chapter.nature_magic.quests4.d: To get both place stone and logs next to the flower and wait about 30 second to a minute
ftbquests.chapter.nature_magic.quests8.d: Best Idea is to start easy and use hydro or endo flower as one only need water sorce blocks and one only takes coal
lets you get some new recipes
to see what the new recipes are click on the block and the click U on it
Only used for creative Items but cool to show off if your on a server :)
Give you limited dupping at the cost of mana

ftbquests.chapter.there_creative_all_rig: This is an optional questline that will unlock as you complete the pack, as its optional your are not expected to complete it.
Welcome to the end if setup right these can make you infinite of any item meaning your baiscly in creative mode! Have fun and enjoy!
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.title: The Start
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests0.desc: This pack is non-expert and as such can be mostly played without any worry of mods blocking others
only exeption to this is the starting mod and the one to thank for why your only on one chunk!
but anyway enough talk let get you set up with the basics!
P.S. this quest book only here if you really really need it if not please just ignore it and do as you please!
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests1.desc: Your first job is to get your first world core this chunk should have one in a chest near bedrock so look there
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests2.desc: first things first you need more room!
To do this there are to chunk spawners currently though you can only make the first one
This one will spawn in a random chunk meaning it should be any of of the chunk in a 20x20 were you place it
This will not place the chunk randomly! if you place it on the north side of the current chunk it will land there and just be a random chunk pulled from that 20x20
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests3.desc: Required to make world cores after finding the first one!
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests4.desc: Does the same as the unstable version but will give you the chunk that meant to be there
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests5.desc: This optional block will scan for any other block if given at lest one of said block and world shards
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests17.des: 1) One of the mods in this pack lets you pass days and night with a bed!

2) A Diffrent mod will pass time sleeping relisticly and not instantly meaning you will see the sun/moon move though the sky as time does pass and also mean things that require the pass of time will grow/ still progress while your sleeping!
3) Currently going into a dimension without a bed will pop you out at world spawn (unless its the nether) to prevent this use a bed to set at new spawn for yourself
4) I Cover a lot about mods in this questbook but do skip some thing so look though mods and check out items i didn't add here!
5) Twerking and Veinminer are both in pack without requirement try to use them to your advantage!
Now that you read though this id take a few second set up any keys you need for mods and get to grinding!
ftbquests.chapter.the_start.quests18.des: Automatic chunk making as long as you have cores or spawners
ftbquests.chapter.torch_master.title: Torch Master
ftbquests.chapter.torch_master.quests0.d: Prevent spawn in a 64x64 area without placing light to do so
ftbquests.chapter.torch_master.quests1.d: prevent spawn in a 3x3 chunk area by placing invisible light down
ftbquests.chapter.torch_master.quests2.d: Prevent spawn of only passive mobs in a 16x16 area without it placing anything down
ftbquests.chapter.torch_master.quests3.d: Clears all light from the lantern in case you no longer want them
ftbquests.chapter.twilight.title: Twilight
ftbquests.chapter.twilight.quests0.descr: all you need is a 2x2 or 3x3 pool of water flowers on all side and and to throw in one diamond and you will have the portal to the twilight
ftbquests.chapter.twilight.quests1.descr: Big bad snake can do a lot of damage even if your in full diamond gear
After this its all up to you iv set what i think is best boss progress but if you wish to do them in a diffrent order then by all means please do

ftbquests.chapter.vanilla.quests37.title: Piglin
ftbquests.chapter.vanilla.quests37.descr: Better get some gold armor before going near there pigs
Hint: this quest will finish when you come within 3 blocks of a piglin so if it randomly does you know your close to one
Hint 2: you can pick up piglin by shift right clicking on them
ftbquests.chapter.vanilla.quests38.descr: To get some get lucky fine a stay blaze or fine a fort
ftbquests.chapter.vanilla.quests39.title: Your village farm starts!
ftbquests.chapter.vanilla.quests39.descr: Villagers the quickest way to get powerful in vanilla standards with only 3 stacks of wheat
Hint: you can pick up villagers by shift right clicking then (try to be kind and leave spawn ones if your in a server)
ftbquests.chapter.vanilla.quests40.descr: You will need to break down the blaze rods and combine them with enderman drops
This besides the end citys is considered the end of vanilla gameplay!

ftbquests.chapter.waystones.title: Waystones
ftbquests.chapter.waystones.quests1.desc: unlike the waystone you don't need to activate these and they are aways public to one another
ftbquests.chapter.waystones.quests2.desc: with 2 of them you can telaport anthing even monsters between the two
ftbquests.chapter.waystones.quests4.desc: lets you return to the waystone you set on the scroll once
ftbquests.chapter.waystones.quests5.desc: binds a waystone to the scroll and lets someone else use it to activate that waystone
ftbquests.chapter.waystones.quests6.desc: Lets you telaport to any waystone free of xp cost at a cooldown cost instead
ftbquests.chapter.wooly_trees.title: Wooly Trees
ftbquests.chapter.wooly_trees.quests0.de: Rare chance to drop from sheep
ftbquests.chapter.wooly_trees.quests1.de: Even rarer then the Normal wooly tree
Hint: will only drop from Jeb_ sheep or 0.001% chance from any colored sheep
